Find the best selection of backpackers accommodation in Barcelona - choose from hostels near Gaudi's Parque Guell or his famous cathedral, Sagrada Familia. If you fancy something more central and lively we have plenty of hostels on Las Ramblas and in the city centre of Barcelona. Barcelona city hostels are top quality so book now and pay no bookings. Find the perfect Barcelona hostel for you - Backpackers BCN. Hostels.com offers the widest selection of cheap hostels in Barcelona.
